name: Civilian Hostile
description: These guys just want to be useful, unfortunately, they aren't good at it.

name: Milita Guard
description: A fresh recruit who recently joined the other locals in defending their land.

name: Milita Grunt
description: Once a guard gains enough time on the battlefield, they are given a better rifle and a fancier helmet.

name: Milita Marksman
description: Some locals showed excellence in marksmanship, gaining them this special role. [Has Greater Detection Range]

name: Riot Police
description: One of the men Darwin hired to maintain control over the city, roaming the streets in riot gear. [Has Defense Buff]

name: Riot Police Captain
description: A high ranking minion of Darwin's. Commands a group of Riot Guards. [Has Defense Buff]

name: Port Authority Guard
description: Grunts taken from the local militas, tasked to guard the hallways of Dawrin's headquarters.

name: UN Defect/Rebel
description: Once a member of a UN Taskforce under Carlos, they followed him into defection.

name: Hazmat Facility Guard
description: Elite units from the United Eastern Front trained specifically to endure the Facility's toxic environment. [Throws Grenades]

name: Hazmat Facility Elite Guard
description: A better equipped variant of the Facility Guard, these guys will throw gas grenades too. [Throws Grenades]

name: Hank {BOSS}
description: Once was a mechanic back home, now the right-hand man of Ivanov, guarding the Fields.
